TITLE thai_pineapple_peanut_chicken_satay

{[Thai Peanut Pineapple Sauce]
# In a bowl combine [1/3 cup pineapple juice], [1/4 cup soy sauce], [1/4 cup brown sugar], [1 tbl fish sauce], [1 tbl lime juice], [2 tsp Sriracha], [1 tsp dry basil], [1 tsp ground garlic], [1/2 tsp ground ginger], [1/4 tsp black pepper].
}

# Chop [2 lbs chicken] into bite size pieces.
# Marinate chicken for 1-4 hours in [3 tbl olive oil], [1/4 cup Thai Peanut Pineapple Sauce].

# In a small pot combine remaining $[Thai Peanut Pineapple Sauce], 1/3 cup coconut milk, [1/4 tsp cornstarch].
# Bring to a boil and simmer for 1 minute.
# Stir in [1/3 cup crunchy peanut butter] and keep warm.

# Grill chcken.
# Garnish with [Freshly squeezed lime juice], [crushed peanuts], [green onions].
